name: Covert Infiltration Tactics
description: Techniques for silently penetrating IDC-controlled institutions while avoiding detection.

cards.title: Creating and Maintaining Cover Identities
cards.description: Developing and sustaining false personas to infiltrate high-risk environments.
bulletpoints: Building credible background stories to avoid suspicion.
Behavioral mimicry techniques to blend into target environments.
Identifying and neutralizing inconsistencies in false identities.
cards.summaryText: Craft airtight cover stories, mirror target behavior, and close any identity inconsistencies.

cards.title: Social Engineering for Deep Access
cards.description: Using psychological manipulation to gain trust and unlock restricted information.
bulletpoints: Exploiting cognitive biases to bypass security barriers.
Leveraging human psychology for privilege escalation.
Understanding deception detection to avoid exposure.
cards.summaryText: Exploit cognitive biases, engineer trust for deeper access, and read tells to stay undetected.

cards.title: Silent Surveillance and Intel Gathering
cards.description: Techniques for gathering and relaying intelligence without leaving a trace.
bulletpoints: Utilizing micro-gestures and NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming) for passive data collection.
Setting up discreet monitoring systems within enemy strongholds.
Avoiding digital and physical footprint exposure in intelligence operations.
cards.summaryText: Harvest intel through subtle cues, covert sensors, and disciplined zero-footprint tradecraft.
